summary: Conversion of R18Pn 09 - Shanoa Armor for UNPB Body.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][size=6][b][center][b]Shanoa Armor UNPB[/b][/center][/b][/size][/font][i][font=Georgia][size=5][b]Description[/b][/size][/font][/i]
[size=3]This is a conversion of R18Pn 09 - Shanoa Armor for UNPB. All are pregnancy-enabled, which mean the Belly size will get bigger if you use Pregnancy Mod. Don't worry, it won't do anything if you don't use pregnancy mod.[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][i][font=Georgia][size=5][b]Update[/b][/size][/font][/i]
[b][size=4]New version 2.0 is available! [/size][/b]

[font=Georgia][size=5][i][b]Variant[/b][/i][/size][/font]
[size=3]There are 3 version available now[/size]
[list][*][size=3]Default version
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Sexy ver: No Skirt + Short Skirt
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Slutty ver: No Skirt + Bottom less[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]
[/size][font=Georgia][size=5][i][b]Requirements[/b][/i][/size][/font]
[list][*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNPB Redux[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20227/?]UNPB MTM[/url] or UNPB derivative.
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]Groovtama's XPMS[/url] Extended or XPMS[/size]
[/*]
[/list]
[font=Georgia][size=5][b][i]Instalation[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[list=1][*][size=3]Download the original UNP version [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52431/?]here[/url].
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Install the UNPB conversion (choose one) via Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Overwrite, choose "yes to all" when prompted.
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Done[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]
[/size][b][i][font=Georgia][size=5]How to Obtain
[/size][/font][/i][/b][size=3]Craft it or via console (type: [i]help "shanoa"[/i])

[/size][font=Georgia][size=5][b][i]Final Words[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[size=3]Please report any clipping issue with screenshots. Please leave a comment and let me know if you have any suggestion or question[/size]
author: Lowe
